title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up when connecting to Derby database
OB: When expanding the 'Data Source' section in the 'Available Items' sector, the expected behavior is that both table icons and column icons should show up. However, the observed behavior is that the column icons do not appear.
EB: When expanding the 'Data Source' section in the 'Available Items' sector, the expected behavior is that both table icons and column icons will show up.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a new project.
2. Create a new report.
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database using the following details:
   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
   - User Name: root
   - Password: root
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset.
5. In the 'Edit Data Set' window, select 'Query'.
6. [Additional steps required to reproduce the issue are missing. Please provide more details.]
